content: the rounds of flowers crochet coasters are happy and colorful the pattern is quick and easy so your coasters will work up in no time this is an awesome scrap-yarn project **materials** 3 0-mm c usa 11 uk hook dk 3 light weight yarn tapestry needle **size** each coaster measures 3 15 8 cm to see more of my projects and patterns visit me on facebook and instagram here www instagram com/raffamusa_designs 1 www facebook com/raffamusadesigns 2 1 https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs 2 https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns
